meanings.definition: A disease caused by infection with the parasite Toxoplasma gondii.
meanings.sent1: Toxoplasmosis can make people feel very sick.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with toxoplasmosis.
meanings.sent3: The party was ruined when toxoplasmosis spread among the guests.
meanings.sent4: Toxoplasmosis crept through the community like a silent intruder.
meanings.sent5: The impact of toxoplasmosis on the body is alarming.

meanings.definition: The presence of Toxoplasma gondii in the body.
meanings.sent1: The toxoplasmosis in his system was causing health problems.
meanings.sent2: The vet confirmed the cat's toxoplasmosis infection.
meanings.sent3: The toxoplasmosis in the fridge made the food go bad.
meanings.sent4: Toxoplasmosis in the body is like having an unwelcome guest.
meanings.sent5: The toxoplasmosis lurking within can be dangerous.
